Text: This close vote sends a clear message to the Senate that this legislation is politically toxic and should not even be considered, much less passed. Minnesotans and Americans must keep making our voices heard to #SaveTheBWCA.

However, the vote was close and showed the broad, bipartisan opposition to a foreign conglomerate threatening our Boundary Waters with toxic mining. I am very appreciative that 22 Republicans broke ranks and joined 182 @HouseDemocrats voting against this destructive bill.

The polluters won today, but the fight is not over. I am deeply disappointed that the U.S. House is now on the record supporting toxic sulfide-ore copper mining on the doorstep of the Boundary Waters.https://twitter.com/RepCloakroom/status/936306707587895297 …

As the House prepares to vote on H.R. 3905, I'm urging my colleagues to vote NO on this destructive legislation. It is simply wrong to put our Boundary Waters at risk to help a foreign mining conglomerate. #SaveTheBWCApic.twitter.com/VGORfqCnKW

H.R. 3905 shortcircuits a careful environmental review and fundamentally alters federal environmental protections to benefit a Chilean mining conglomerate with a poor environmental record. 

To #SaveTheBWCA, we must defeat this dangerous bill.

The U.S. House will vote today on H.R. 3905, which paves the way for dangerous sulfide-ore copper mining on the doorstep of the Boundary Waters. 

I'm urging my colleagues to join me and vote NO on this dangerous bill. We must #SaveTheBWCA.

ICYMI: I'm joining colleagues on both sides of the aisle opposing H.R. 3905, which paves the way for dangerous sulfide-ore copper mining that will likely destroy the Boundary Waters forever. We must #SaveTheBWCA.pic.twitter.com/wCXk0b2P0Z

I met today with Ramsey County Attorney John Choi and Saint Paul Police Chief Todd Axtell about need for gun violence prevention legislation and our strong opposition to gun lobby-backed bills that take us backwards. #StopCCR #StopGunViolencepic.twitter.com/S4ClZgvVAb

The Fond du Lac, Grand Portage, and White Earth Bands of Minnesota Chippewa all oppose dangerous sulfide-ore copper mining adjacent to the #BWCA. 

That's one reason I'm fighting to stop H.R. 3905. #SaveTheBWCA
Thank you to my Minnesota colleagues @keithellison and @RepErikPaulsen for speaking out today against H.R. 3905. People of both parties know we must #SaveTheBWCA!

.@realDonaldTrump's budget is a mess for Minnesota. Will @HouseGOP stand with Minnesota families & communities or back #TrumpCuts?
These 10 examples are just the start. @realDonaldTrump's budget touches virtually every program & shifts burdens onto Minnesota taxpayers.
10/ @Amtrak service at St. Paul's Union Depot could be eliminated as funding is refocused to the Northeast. #TrumpCuts is bad for transit.
9/ Community Development Block Grant, which helps economic development & affordable housing, is gone. #TrumpCuts = less investment in MN.
8/ Support for the arts and the humanities is zeroed out. #TrumpCuts imperils our community's cultural, civic & economic life.
7/ Community Services Block Grant for Community Action Agencies to fight poverty is terminated. #TrumpCuts leaves most vulnerable behind.
6/ Minnesota will get less money to keep our roads and highways safe & commuters moving. #TrumpCuts sends roads towards gridlock.
5/ AmeriCorps and Senior Corps are abolished, putting a big strain on Minnesota nonprofits. #TrumpCuts means fewer volunteers.
4/ Public school students will lose resources in school & after-school programs eliminated. #TrumpCuts is bad for our children.
3/ Heating assistance and home weatherization for families & seniors is eliminated. #TrumpCuts leaves Minnesotans in the cold.
2/ Superfund program will be cut dramatically, meaning more toxic waste sites will fester in communities. #TrumpCuts threaten public health.
1/ Law enforcement will have fewer resources to keep us safe & to support victims of domestic violence. #TrumpCuts are downright dangerous.
How will Minnesotans (and all Americans) be affected by the devastating cuts in @realDonaldTrump's budget? Here’s just a few ways.
